Loggers
==========

BLADE provides several loggers to store experiment results locally or in
external tracking tools.

Trackio
-------

Install the optional ``trackio`` dependency to mirror runs to a local or
remote Trackio dashboard using :class:`iohblade.loggers.TrackioExperimentLogger`.

.. automodule:: iohblade.loggers
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:
